description: This file defines a GeminiEmbedder class that integrates with Google’s GenAI API to generate embeddings for text. It manages API client creation, constructs requests, and extracts embedding vectors and usage info from responses.

classes.name: GeminiEmbedder
classes.description: A class that provides methods to generate text embeddings using Google’s GenAI API, with configurable parameters and response handling.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns the GeminiClient instance, creating it if necessary, using API key and parameters.

methods.name: _response
methods.description: Constructs and sends a request to the API to get embedding content for the provided text.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Returns a list of float embeddings for the given text, handling response extraction and errors.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Returns a tuple of embeddings and usage info (like billable character count) for the given text.
